name: Guy Phone 17+
description:
Guy Phone! 17+
What is it? Well, It's a simple running game and addictive!!!

Forget the Clash and Birds that are angry, forget rope cutting and crafting in mines, THIS is the App to be played.

What do you do?
You control Guy, a little character running through the jungle collecting gold phones. (Obviously where you would find loads of phone lying around)
Try not to bump the rocks or land on the ice or fire as he doesn't like that and you'll know about it

Please be aware this game is not for Minors, you must be 17+ to know what the little "Guy" is saying when he lands on the fire or slips on the ice. The language is a little… colourful shall we say.

Connected to the Game Centre. How far into the jungle can you go?

WARNING! it's addictive! WARNING! the language is not very mild! WARNING! you'll either love it or hate it.

Go on, have another go!
